} } } Length:: 0:51 MinsI was very apprehensive to get this given the bad reviews but I really needed an underwater camera without breaking the bank. I am truly happy that I did extensive research and got this camera. I want to post pictures and a video as soon as I can but it is definitely worth the purchase if you want to save on a "go pro" price. I have not tested the shockproof capabilities and I honestly do not want to. Additionally I made sure to wipe down the camera after every exposure to water and limited the time in the water environment.Pros:Great pricenice design and sturdy in handworks well in water (what it was designed to do)good video qualityeasy to usegreat camera features, maybe not great, but "fun"Cons:flash capabilities limited (auto or off)if you dont have correct setting, pictures can be distorted and uselessthanks for reading!!ps: go check out the pics I uploaded to support this review!!!

Reviews.Author: Anita Gibbon
Reviews.Content: We got this for our daughter for Christmas.  It has been perfect for her and she has really enjoyed using it.  It was perfect!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful product
Reviews.Author: Tiffany
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical purchasing this product because of the negative reviews, but was pleasantly surprised when I took it snorkeling in Cozumel. The camera is easy to use and the underwater photos turned out gorgeous. Battery life was better than expected.Thank you Nikon!

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Sabrina
Reviews.Content: The service is excellent,  but the camera is inferior to what I have read. On the screen is not the sharpest image

Reviews.Title: Low Cost Sealed Camera
Reviews.Author: Brent Yatman
Reviews.Content: We bought this due to its ability to hold up in dusty environments and for that it worked.  It did however have major issues with flash detection.  There are some camera settings that make it better, but no real fix.  In our application a standard point and shoot lasts approximately one month due to the high dust.  This camera has been used for about 3 months now with no issues.  We are going to purchase a few more.  The best camera for our application is about $300 more expensive and isn't that much better than this camera.  The new Nikon model of this camera may have fixed the flash issue.

Reviews.Title: Great vacations camera
Reviews.Author: DAVID MOJICA
Reviews.Content: Great for vacations, you don't have to worry if it rains, you can take it to the beach, easy to use. Really like it a lot. The only downfall is that you can turn off the flash or turn it automatic, but can not turn it always on. I'll give this little camera a 7 out of 10.

Reviews.Title: Bargain camera, no complaints.
Reviews.Author: Roger J. Porter "rogerjporter"
Reviews.Content: picture quality is adequate for internet use and 4x6's, we haven't tried to print anything bigger.  The kids and I use this for pics around the pool as well as the beach.  It's lasted a whole summer and fall with no leaks or breaks.  Great product

Reviews.Title: Performed perfectly.
Reviews.Author: Shane T. Rogers "timrogers"
Reviews.Content: We took this camera on a cruise to the Caribbean.  The camera took great pictures above water.  The camera got wet several times, even submerged while snorkeling.  The underwater pictures were okay--a little dark, but we're not disappointed.  We took three cameras with us but this one was taking great pictures and was the only waterproof camera so we used this one the most.  A great purchase.

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the price
Reviews.Author: Jamie Behr
Reviews.Content: I've had trouble with it freezing up or just turning off when trying to take pictures. If your looking for a basic point and shoot that is easy to use this is a good choice. It's very rugged also so great for a child's use.

Reviews.Title: Issues with flash working properly
Reviews.Author: Joe Harris
Reviews.Content: There's no way to keep the flash turned on and auto-flash doesn't sense darkness well enough. It's useless at night.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the Money
Reviews.Author: Jesus Lover
Reviews.Content: I just love my new camera.  Good resolution.  I was buying disposable cameras which cost $4 each.  To develop each roll with double prints cost $14.50, for a whopping total of $18.50 per roll!  Too expensive!  So I invested in this digital camera, a much cheaper solution in the long run.  I can take pictures or vidoes, download them to my computer, and burn them to disk.  That way, if my computer crashes or a drive fails, I can still have them safe.  You have to buy a SD card with it.  My card is 16 GB and cost about $12, and I am told that should hold about 800 pictures.  You can buy a case separately.  My 11-year-old son liked my camera so much, he bought himself the same camera;and he is having a blast using it!  It is easy to use, and comes with a USB cable for easy dowloading to the computer.  I love that it is shock proof; so if you accidentally drop it, it should still work.  You can make slide shows on your camera, and customize the screen or the photo borders.  A good investment for regular photographers like me.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for Utility Field workers!
Reviews.Author: ~Devildog~
Reviews.Content: Seems to be a great choice for using in the field......... water and dust resistant! Not too complicated to use........

Reviews.Title: simple camera good price
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Wadler "Jeff Wadler"
Reviews.Content: Bought one initially in pink for my daughter before a vacation last year.  Just before ordering this one my 3 year old did not drop it, but threw it and broke it, hence the purchase of this one in white.  For the price, both of them were used it was no great burden to replace.  Takes good pictures, very good for a child, good for anyone who wants a simple point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Amazing camera in a beautiful color
Reviews.Author: Nora Reguig
Reviews.Content: This product is amazing. I bought it for my niece and she absolutely loved it!!!! The color is beautiful. The blue is just so captivating… The only thing was that it didn't come with a memory card, you have to buy one separately but thats ok for the excited look on her face. It was well worth it. The camera also came very quick. It was delivered within a week of ordering it. THANK YOU guys so much!

Reviews.Title: Its ok
Reviews.Author: uziel
Reviews.Content: It take ok pictures it looks wired. Plus it doesn't tell you simple things to know what to do. Like for a example how to use the flash i sometimes didn't know how to use it. I would take pictures it didn't do flash and sometimes it did. Plus you cant record anything under water under 15 seconds.

Reviews.Title: works fine for it's purpose
Reviews.Author: Patty A.
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for our Troop to use on campouts - certainly easy to use, the controls are almost childlike.

Reviews.Title: Cheaper than a GoPro!
Reviews.Author: Grimjaw
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace the same model that I lost on a cross country trip.  Besides normal camera use, I mount it on my motorcycle to record special rides.  It may not have the resolution of the newest GoPros, but it is as good as I will ever need.  It held up very well in the rain.  The only problem I experienced was loss of battery power in near freezing temps.  Not the camera's fault.  New, warm batteries worked just fine.  As soon as the batteries warmed up, they were good to go again.

Reviews.Title: Not a bad camera
Reviews.Author: Breianna Buskee
Reviews.Content: It worked wonderfully for us... during the day time. The flash is not something you can control. It's either on & auto or turned off. It would go off at random times, but we could not get it to go off in the dead of the night, so we returned it. If you think you'll never take nighttime pictures, it's a perfect camera with tons of fun settings. But unless ours was a malfunction, it's not going to take pictures at night that require a flash.

Reviews.Title: good for the money
Reviews.Author: Cliff C
Reviews.Content: I bought this to take snorkeling on a cruise to the Carribean.  I didn't want to spend a lot of money on an underwater camera, so after reading the reviews I chose this one.  It works well enough for the price.  I was a little disappointed that the pictures weren't as clear as I had hoped.  But that may have been operator error.  I'd buy it again if I didn't want to spend a bunch.

Reviews.Title: Good Photos and Easy to Use
Reviews.Author: Not Provided
Reviews.Content: This is a handy little camera, good to depths that would be reached while snorkeling.  The strobe brings out the natural colors of the subjects, and it is very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for water sports
Reviews.Author: Shawn Brennan
Reviews.Content: The camera worked well for taking pictures while on a week long canoe trip.  The pictures were clear and sharp.  I did not have to worry about getting the camera wet.  I just to make sure i kept the camera in a ziplock back while on the water, just in case.

Reviews.Title: Coolpix cameras
Reviews.Author: Cyndy Gilbert
Reviews.Content: These cameras are of average quality but easy to use - these cameras are used in the workplace and are fairly reliable.

Reviews.Title: Took to Philippines
Reviews.Author: eric w brazeel
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for underwater pictures while snorkeling in the ocean. I couldn't believe how clear the pictures came out. Camera seemed to have a little trouble deciding to use the flash or not, but otherwise worked flawlessly

Reviews.Title: Easy to use.
Reviews.Author: Lance L Mumford
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because its waterproof. It is a bit larger than the S200 that it replaced. So far I have been happy with the picture quality.It is an easy to use point and shoot camera.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this with high expectations
Reviews.Author: Cynthia J. Hall Dumale
Reviews.Content: Basically a toy.  Bought it anticipating it to be a replacement for my Flip video camera and bc I expect to use it for mostly snorkeling and shooting video for swim drills.  I may only use it for swim drills.  First off, kudos to the waterproofing system.  I just got back from giving it a test run in my gym's pool and there were no problems.  Video quality on a 1-10 scale, (10 being 1040HD), I'd put it somewhere between 3 and 4.  Picture taking...DO NOT, repeat DO NOT buy this for its picture taking features.  I am a novice DSLR user and taking pics with this thing seriously pisses me off.  There is a microsecond delay between the time you press the button and when the pic is actually taken so unless your subjects are standing perfectly still, you're not getting the shot.  Bottom line:  If you want a get-me-by waterproof tool, something you need to have handy, or on a tight budget - this is suitable.  If you can spend a little more, look at higher end items.  Pentax and Panasonic offer waterproof cams under $150.  I picked this up for $79 and will hand it to my 9 yr old after I'm done.

Reviews.Title: five stars for $90
Reviews.Author: Amazon Fan
Reviews.Content: Remember this camera is only $90 and it waterproof.Tomorrow I am heading to Cancun to go snorkeling.  However I wanted a waterproof camera to document our trip.  I will be taking my semi professional camera for the mayan ruins, sunsets etc.  However I also wanted something I could take into the ocean and I didn't want to buy a $400 case for my camera.  Not to mention Changing white balance underwater can be tricky.  I wanted a specialized camera, and this fit the bill.- Cheap- waterproof- auto underwater white balance.- If I break it so what!- If next time I go to the beach camera's are light years better toss this one and buy a new one.Granted I have not gone yet however I did test out the camera in my hot tub.  it worked great!!!  I can't wait to take pictures in Mexico.I will try and update the review after my trip.

Reviews.Title: User Friendly
Reviews.Author: macissej
Reviews.Content: This camera is very simple to use and takes crisp and clear photos. I love all of the options for setting, like fireworks and underwater video. It also has a variety of features such as fish eye, and the ability to focus in the center of the lens, and blur out the sides for a dramatic effect. Simply wonderful. If does not feet cheap and the blue is eye catching. I plan to buy more!

Reviews.Title: Coolpix
Reviews.Author: tebo3shes
Reviews.Content: Wonderful camera.......always had good luck with Nikon and it was a gift so I was hoping the person would like it and use it and it is good.

Reviews.Title: Exactly as advertised - exactly what we wanted.
Reviews.Author: David S.
Reviews.Content: We wanted simple, waterproof and with non-proprietary batteries.  The photos are very good.  It was easy to upload with USB cable.

Reviews.Title: Good for nothing
Reviews.Author: gyurxi551
Reviews.Content: I have to say that Nikon has very good products in the DSLR segment. But the compact cameras... You can find videos and pictures on my youtube channel under same nickname. This camera has NO fill flash option! Only auto (doesn't turn on in the dark) and disabled flash mode. And using 30minutes in beach the whole camera got foggy from inside. The second day it was completely useless. Nikon took 3 weeks to send be back without being repaired. So I recommend this camera for

Reviews.Title: ok a little bulky but seems weather resistant
Reviews.Author: Marjorie W. Dunaway "MarjD"
Reviews.Content: Sometimes I have troubles w the shutter release but it has served as a sufficient outdoor pocket camera. I've even taken a few underwater pics with it.  Seems to eat batteries fairly quickly and adjustments are limited. I'd try a thinner other brand starting w P next. It has proven fairly durable in the year + I have had it.

Reviews.Title: Great small camera
Reviews.Author: CarylAine "CarylAine"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my husband to take fishing on his boat.  He hasn't dropped it in the water yet, so not sure about the water feature, but the camera takes good pictures.

Reviews.Title: Thank you!
Reviews.Author: Megan D. Ohmie
Reviews.Content: Not what I was looking for in a camera. The pictures did not come out very nice or clear. I

Reviews.Title: This is a great back-up camera for a trip.
Reviews.Author: Hubert F. Schmauch
Reviews.Content: Here is a very afforable underwater backup camera, that oppeates with AA batteries that can hold a charge for 9 years to record a picture. The downside is that it dose not take the best picture all the time, but even iPhoto or Photoshop can fix most of them.

Reviews.Title: If I could give it no stars, I would...
Reviews.Author: mp1101
Reviews.Content: Very disappointed in Nikon with this camera. Went to St. Lucia, brought it out snorkeling the first day out, after about 3 pictures, it stopped turning on, did everything the manual says after taking it in water; batteries out, SD out, etc...  But just like other people said, had lots of condensations in the lens and completely stopped working.  Not happy at all, had to buy disposable cameras on resort at $20 US ....

Reviews.Title: Really good camera
Reviews.Author: Jessica H.
Reviews.Content: Excellent choice for a vacation, you can take it with you on all the rides, it can get wet, it can take a beating, and it takes great pictures and mini movies. I would not take this under water, but the ocasional splash from a ride was fine, and did not effect the functionality.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Ana Luisa
Reviews.Content: This has been a fantastic purchase and is a product I highly recommend:This has been a fantastic purchase and is a product I highly recommend:

Reviews.Title: good for what it is and for the price
Reviews.Author: Eduardo Garcia
Reviews.Content: its good for short periods of time underwater, the images are great if you are in a sunny day (tons of light), but the colors are inconsistent

Reviews.Title: It's "meh"
Reviews.Author: D in Oklahoma
Reviews.Content: I would rate this a so-so camera.  I like the fact that it's a digital water camera, however, the pictures are not any better than a waterproof disposable camera.  It doesn't matter how new the batteries, clarity is always an issue.  If the camera or the focal point is moving in the slightest, the picture will be blurry.I have used this camera snorkeling and the pictures were alright.  The water was unbelievably clear and the lightening was wonderful so I expected more from the photos.  I have also used it at water parks and some of the pictures are clear enough to use.If I could do it over again., I would invest in a different camera.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Camera! My granddaughter 4 years old loves her Christmas gift
Reviews.Author: patriot
Reviews.Content: My 4 year old granddaughter can take great pictures and operates it like she has been doing forever. The hot pink is really vibrant colors. The menu is easy to navigate. This camera takes great pictures. Haven't dropped it yet, but according to Nikon you should be able to drop it 3 feet and not hurt it. The flash in the middle is also great because little fingers dont block it. I would definetly recommend it. For the price its a great buy.

Reviews.Title: camera great for kids
Reviews.Author: Mommaof4
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son (6) and he loves it.  It is boy proof- although he is careful with his things, but he is still a boy!!!!

Reviews.Title: Works underwater, not many features
Reviews.Author: Jon
Reviews.Content: We tested this right out of the box and the camera is indeed water proof!  Only 10 ft I believe it said on the box, but that's enough for me, just don't want to ruin it when we go on cruises.The one thing that bothered me is it doesn't have an option to have the flash on by default.  It's either auto or off.  Otherwise, for as cheap as it was, it works for me!

Reviews.Title: Water proof camera
Reviews.Author: Margarita Nuqui
Reviews.Content: Its a beautiful camera it takes nice, I mean nice pictures it live up to the Nikon name. It records too! Its worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: good camera for a child, though not as simple as the hype
Reviews.Author: Andrew NW
Reviews.Content: We got this camera for a 5-year-old, because the description said "just 3 buttons."Our 5-year-old likes it very much, though he does get a little frustrated because, while there ARE just 3 buttons for TAKING pictures, there are FOUR MORE buttons AND a jog-ring that must be figured out to LOOK AT your pictures.So a little bit over-simplistic description.Still, I give it four stars because it is a quality camera that, in the two weeks since Christmas, has taken a lot of use and abuse from a five-year-old and it's still taking quality pictures and video.  As our boy grows into this camera, I think it'll give him a lot of pleasure - he REALLY likes being able to take his own pictures/video without having to ask permission to use Mom & Dad's camera.

Reviews.Title: Not very drop-proof as touted.
Reviews.Author: g. patrick hunter III
Reviews.Content: Menus are hard to follow.  Owner's manual is very vauge and does not cover all the features.  Worst, it is rated as shock-proof for a drop from 2.5 feet, but mine broke from a drop of about two feet.  The lens is now inoperable and I only had it for two weeks.

Reviews.Title: Good kids playing camera !!
Reviews.Author: ESTEBAN L. E "Smart CR eBuyer"
Reviews.Content: Excellent for kids, they love taking pictures underwater and in rainy conditions  !!!, just don't expect a pro underwater equipment ...

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: HR BRACK
Reviews.Content: HOWEVER, I don't recall the ad for it stating that it doesn't have an internal memory that will hold more than 7 pictures.  I have ordered an 8 Gb SSD card for it though.

Reviews.Title: Ok Camera
Reviews.Author: Shazzy
Reviews.Content: It will serve its purpose of protecting my everyday camera and phone from being dropped in the water. Photo quality hit and miss. Great on some but if the sun is too bright it is really washed out looking.. I love Nikon and this is the first product I haven't loved

Reviews.Title: very good camera
Reviews.Author: Michael Grossfeld
Reviews.Content: takes great easy pictures under and above water. only problem was that it needs a brighter flash, the pictures are washed out and dull if it's just a few feet under the surface and subject is five or six feet away

Reviews.Title: Good for kids
Reviews.Author: Lwalters
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 6 year old and she loves it. It's easy enough for her to use, has some cool features, and rugged enough that I don't worry if she drops it or gets it wet. The pictures seem clear as well.

Reviews.Title: PURCHASED FOR TODDLER
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: I GOT THIS CAMERA FOR MY TODDLER WHO REALLY WANTED TO PLAY WITH MINE ALL THE TIME.  I LIKE THAT IT IS WATER RESISTANT AND SHOCK RESITANT.  WITH MY EXPERINCE WITH IT OVER THE CHRISTMAS WEEK I WOULD PURCHASE THIS AGAIN.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: hydeehoe
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for christmas because I went paddle boarding and kayaking and i needed it to take pictures on the water. it took amazing pictures and when i fell into the water it still worked fine. the picture quality is outstanding under and out of the water. perfect for capturing all of the moments in the ocean and pool

Reviews.Title: Sad:(
Reviews.Author: Michal
Reviews.Content: I bought this a few days before a weekend vacation with my husband and I really wish I would have tested it out first. I should have known from the price that it was too good to be true. This camera would be good for a child to learn to take pictures. I can't think of any other good use for it . It took some decent pictures outside by the pool but we didn't have any indoor pictures from our entire trip because there is no flash! It has an automatic flash only which never detects that it needs to be on. You cannot turn the flash on in any way . So sad. Thank aged I have an iPhone now and can just take pics that way . The company did allow me to return the item for a refund with no problem, thank goodness.

Reviews.Title: Takes great pictures
Reviews.Author: Beth Thomas
Reviews.Content: this is a great camera, took awesome pictures on land and under sea. it really is point and shoot beautiful pictures.  the only negative is that the compartment that holds the battery and photo card is very difficult to open (probably in order to keep it waterproof.)

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: glen green
Reviews.Content: Bought this for an 11 year old girl (pink right).  She is totally thrilled.  Takes great pictures and had a great price.

Reviews.Title: The Coolpix S30 is a great inexpensive little camera!
Reviews.Author: Romeo421
Reviews.Content: It's a great little waterproof, shockproof camera.  It's only $75, takes clear pics underwater.  I dropped it while on vacationand it still works great.  sed it underwater and it is very clear.  The videos are not the best-little 'choppy' but the sound is very good.  It's a fun, easy to use little inexpensive camera.

Reviews.Title: good for pool, not cool ocean  water
Reviews.Author: Ann
Reviews.Content: Product is as described except that the lens fogs up permanently when taken into the ocean, in Florida so not that cold.  It is now useless.  I would not recommend this camera if you want to take anything but land and warm pool shots.  Very poor Nikon support for this camera.

Reviews.Title: My First Nikon
Reviews.Author: Donald VanGrouw
Reviews.Content: Bought this because I needed an inexpensive waterproof camera.  This is a basic camera for me but I did not want to pay for a long zoom, did not need the 14megapixels and this was priced below the competition. I expect Nikon quality in this camera just as in their DSLRs so it works for me.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S30
Reviews.Author: Tony Rolfe
Reviews.Content: Not happy with this camera. We have a lot of trouble with it. Worked Okay for a few weeeks then it stoped saving the Pic's. Changed SD card and no change. Called Nikon and not much help. This is the only Nikon I have ever had trouble with. I own 4 others model's and they all work great..

Reviews.Title: This is a 'Feel Good' Point-and-Shoot Camera
Reviews.Author: R H F
Reviews.Content: The Nikon CoolPix S30 point-and-shot Camera plus a 512MB SD-Card gives 100 full quality HD Pictures and is used for simple 'snap-shots'.  The 'right' Combo for a Senior Citizen; feels good in the hand; and easy to hold-up to the face and simply snap-a-shot {fun to use}.  This Combo replaces 3+ of those 27 Picture Film Disposable Flash Cameras.  Plus allows for : at home picture editing, online print ordering, and web photo sharing.

Reviews.Title: JUNK!
Reviews.Author: Mark Edwards "Father of 5"
Reviews.Content: Junk!  NOT waterproof!  Don't even get a splash on it or it won't work.  So dissatisfied.  Not only does it stop working when it gets wet but the quality of shots sucks and after a few months it is unable to transfer photos to computer.  DO NOT BUY!

Reviews.Title: Great for fist timers
Reviews.Author: Paula Gamble "Paula"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my son's first camera thinking that a water and shock proof camera would be the way to go.  He loves it. The picture quality is not the greatest as it is only 10.1 MP but good enough for him to run around with taking pictures and videos. I don't have to worry about it getting damage as much as I thought as the casing is metal and hard plastic both.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera
Reviews.Author: Cecilia
Reviews.Content: I like the fact that I can do Video and still shots.  My dogs have been my main focus, can't wait to venture out and really have fun.. My reason for this camera was to document things because our adult children are in different states. I would say if your looking for a good sturdy camera this is it!!

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera, just wished it had a regular view finder in the bright sunlight. We use it for our Home Inspection Business.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't take good pictures
Reviews.Author: crayzel
Reviews.Content: If you're specifically looking for a durable camera to use underwater then maybe this camera is right for you.  I was looking for a new camera and thought the waterproof feature would be cool and could come in handy at some point.  Unfortunately, this camera has a really long lag time between pressing the button and actually taking the picture and pictures often come out blurry, even when you're still for the entire lag time.  That makes it really not ideal for trying to catch pictures of my young kids who can't stay still for any amount of time--especially not when they're in water which makes the waterproof feature pretty useless.  And even the "good" pictures were pretty bad quality.  I ended up returning this for a different camera  in the same price range that isn't waterproof but takes much better pictures.

Reviews.Title: buy the panasonic
Reviews.Author: Christina Wodtke "~christina~"
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately, I bought this in a hurry for a trip to Thailand. The pictures were poor (both daylight and underwater), the interface is difficult to use above water and impossible below, and though it's "shockproof" the lens broke in my carry on on the way home, with no dropping/slamming or shocks, no now I don't suppose I can even return it.I had a panasonic before this one I loved, and after reading dpreviews, it's clear I should have replaced it with another panasonic rather than this piece of junk. Which I just did.

Reviews.Title: Nikon lost opportunity
Reviews.Author: Alfonso Betancourt
Reviews.Content: I bought the Nikon S30 looking for a family camera that can be used by children and for taking pictures around water.The BIG problem with this camera are indoor photos.  My iphone 4 takes better pictures once you get into a room.  The images have lot of noise and a plastic look when you are not in perfect sun light.Even outside, you can't force flash for fill-in flash when needed.The VR implementation is very poor, even useless with videos.  They come out jerky.The ergonomics for kids may be the best part of this camera.  I haven't take the camera under water, but don't expect good pictures when the light isn't perfect.I was expecting a little more from Nikon.  They have the technology and the know how to make better cameras, but they just lost a good oportunity to attract new comers to their brand.Otherwise, I'm a satisfied client with other Nikon cameras like D7000 and P7000.

Reviews.Title: very disappointed
Reviews.Author: Daniel W. Larson
Reviews.Content: I bought what I thought to be a new camera. It came ..appeared to be a repackaged used camera and did not even work properly. VERY DiSAPPOINTED!

Reviews.Title: this camera sucks
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: the flash never works, Nikon says it works fine (sent it back 4 times)  but when you shoot in a totally dark room at night the flash does not fire, run away from this piece of S***e

Reviews.Title: Don't buy it
Reviews.Author: Alejandro Martinez
Reviews.Content: The image quality is really bad, and it's even worst when you take underwater pictures.It's a piece of rubbish.

Reviews.Title: Good waterproof camera
Reviews.Author: keepitsimple
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a basic camera to take with us on the water.  This camera fit our needs well.  My only dislike is that it uses AA batteries instead of a rechargeable lithium battery.  But so far the battery life has been acceptable.

Reviews.Title: Don't Buy this
Reviews.Author: Pamela Murphy
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my niece. She was so excited until she took it on vacation and it is suppose to be able to go under water, well it died as soon as she went under water. Very disappointed. And i have gotten knowwhere with the warranty to replace :(

Reviews.Title: Zoom and focus??
Reviews.Author: Anthony J. Thiessen
Reviews.Content: The zoom and focus stopped working after 3 months. We used it for pictures and video, were somewhat satisfied with the quality, but the camera really should last longer. I tried to update the firmware, but it wouldn't recognize the file either. Will not buy it again. I would have tried to return it for warranty, problem is we live in Canada and it is only warranted for the US.

Reviews.Title: Is not Waterproof
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: this is a really bad camera, it isnt waterproof, i was using it  in a pool and it stoped working, when i saw the camera it was full of water inside it. I was in cancun and all that i wanted was good pictures inside water. this is a really bad camera. i really  advice to everybody not to buy this piece of junk.

Reviews.Title: For the price, this is a reasonable waterproof camera
Reviews.Author: Pikkidok
Reviews.Content: Apart from this, there are no other waterproof cameras available for less than USD100 that runs on AA batteries.The newer Coolpix S31 uses a proprietary lithium battery, a feature that I do not like.Why do I like AA batteries for inexpensive cameras?I used to own a Canon Digital Ixus or Elph as they call it in some countries.I look after my things very well and after 6 years, it is still in great working condition but I had to junk this camera.The battery cannot hold charge. Being a product sold 6 years earlier, I cannot find a new battery. I found a generic battery which was completely useless. What is the point of having a camera but you cannot find or buy a battery to run it?Most cameras run on proprietary batteries. Just another way for the manufacturers to earn more money from you.A proprietary battery can cost from USD50-150 a piece. And for a USD100 camera?This camera is waterproof and kinda shock proof. I expect it to last. So having AA batteries is vital. I want to be able to use this camera in 10 years!Contrary to the idea of making this camera simple to use, I find it difficult. I don't think kids will know how to utilize the controls. Of course, switching it on and pressing the shutter is easy enough but to switch off the flash requires several button presses.Being a happy-snapper, hardly any controls that you can adjust, the picture quality is decent. Don't expect too much from a small aperture camera with a tiny sensor. You pictures are not meant to be enlarged beyond 5X7 prints.It will never be able to take better pictures than other compacts even at this price range. But those, you will not be able to bring underwater or at the beach or pool side.The video shooting is fairly straightforward with a separate shutter on the left.I cannot say that this camera is bad because there are no fair comparison. Get an ordinary non-waterproof compact if you want better pictures but this is as good as it gets for a water submergeable camera at this price

Reviews.Title: Shock proof? I think not!
Reviews.Author: The Salter Family
Reviews.Content: We purchased this "Shock Proof" camera for our seven year old daughter, a budding photographer. We debated between this one and a camera specifically designed for kids. We decided on this one, though a little more expensive, because we wouldn't be embarassed to carry it as an adult and it's a Nikon. The box labels it as "Water Proof, up to x meters" and "Shock Proof" (with no specification as far as height). My daughter loved carrying it around and snapping photos and videos. Then, she tripped and the camera fell to the ground. The display screen was broken. We contacted Nikon customer service right away. My husband was told that the camera is only shock proof BELOW 2.5 feet. Seriously? So, if you're carrying your camera below your knee and drop it, then it's covered. But, anything above 2.5 feet isn't covered. Our seven year old is probably around three feet tall. We were told the breakage wasn't covered. My husband's reply "Do you think she was carrying the camera on her head?!" Long story short, they refused to fix it. They refused to replace it. I even sent in an email, stating I am a professional photographer, who uses only Nikon products and that if they didn't step up their customer service I would make sure all my photographer friends knew how subpar their service is. I received back a form email! In the end, we had to take it back to the store, argue with THEIR customer service as well, before receiving a refund. Don't buy this camera if you're looking for something that is actually shock proof. Because this one isn't it!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Choice for a low cost underwater Camera
Reviews.Author: C. T. KUNDE
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my 13 yr. old grandson.  His Sony was ruined when he went on a water ride at Six Flaggs, so I decided he needed a waterproof camera.  We were both delighted to learn this camera is designed to take photos and video for a least 7 ft. underwater.  He went river rafting at Tahoe and he had so much fun with taking photos/videos underwater.  It is also shatterproof.  Quality of pictures is excellent.  I would highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Katty
Reviews.Content: The camera was delivered on time, was an used camera but is like new, and the best of all, i like the pictures of this camera.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for vacation
Reviews.Author: Tiffany
Reviews.Content: Me and my boyfriend recently went on a vacation to Dominican Republic. I got the camera because i figured we would be going  to be in the water and what not, it held up great. We took it in the ocean and the pool and had no leaks. Perfect for wanting something small to carry around. Pictures came out great.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Inexpensive Waterproof Nikon! Love it!
Reviews.Author: E911Angel
Reviews.Content: I took this camera to Myrtle Beach to test it's abilities before I take it on a cruise. The pictures taken in the water are amazing. I didn't try for underwater pics, because, if you've ever been to Myrtle, you know the water isn't clear enough for that near the shore. The pictures I did take were clear and crisp and everything you'd expect from a Nikon, in and out of the water!

Reviews.Title: Nikon S30
Reviews.Author: Manny
Reviews.Content: Bought the camera for my daughter which is six years old and she loves it as well as I. Very easy and fun to use. I highly recommend it especially for youngsters

Reviews.Title: If I could give this camera zero stars, I would!
Reviews.Author: Ali Holt
Reviews.Content: This camera was a HUGE disappointment. I don't even normally write reviews, but had to so that others wouldn't make the mistake of buying this camera and having it break at an inopportune moment.I bought this camera for a trip to the caribbean. When I got it home and tested it out, the pictures were decent in daylight, but HORRIBLE in even the shade. Totally grainy, blurry, etc. In the bright daylight, I will say the pictures weren't bad. But the video camera was so confusing to work. You have to push the button about twice before it turns on, then its really hard to tell when it turns off.On our cruise, I took it in the water with us at the beach. It worked good one day, getting a few fun underwater pictures near the surface. However, the camera SUCKED the life out of the batteries quickly. I mean I went through like 6 sets in 2 days. It was horrible and totally not practical at all. They need to make this a camera like other cameras that charge in the wall or computer.The day we went to Stingray city, I put in brand new batteries just minutes before going in the water with the stingrays. Not even kidding you, I took one picture, and the camera said battery life exhausted. I was sick. Luckily my parents had a non- waterproof camera so that we got a few pictures, but I was super bummed. This same thing happended again when we went cave tubing. Batteries didn't even work for an hour before they were sucked dry. Barely got any pictures of our fun adventure.Our last adventure was snorkeling. This camera states to be waterproof to 9 feet. We went snorkeling in a reef and didn't take the camera more than 6 feet underwater. When we got to the surface, the camera had let water in. It shorted out and went completely dead.At least I got my money back from Target, but for being a Nikon, I was really surprised at what a big piece of junk this is. I normally shoot with a Nikon D40 SLR so I am a big fan of Nikon in the SLR department, but this camera was absolutely horrible. Spend the extra $100 and buy something from Cannon or Sony that is not just a play toy for kids.

Reviews.Title: filled with water at the first shot
Reviews.Author: izlen
Reviews.Content: Don't ever think of buying this camera. I bought it for my 8 year daughter. Here's the photo after first use in 1.5 mt deep pool. [...] . I bought it from Dubai and they don't change the camera. Idiot seller says "did you change the battery underwater?". I'm living in Turkey and guarantee of Nikon is not valid here. It is only valid in the country where you bought it.

Reviews.Title: First time I used it, LCD screen fogged and was useless
Reviews.Author: D. Mutton
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera specifically for a recent vacation as I knew I would be doing some snorkeling.  As I didn't want the hassle of a point and shoot disposable, but don't go snokeling very often,  I wanted something digital, midprice and reliable and chose Nikon as a leading brand.  When the camera arrived, I was surprised at how heavy it was and quite chunky, but it seemed sturdy and as it is also meant to be shockproof, seemed fine.  I inserted batteries and an SD card and was up and running.The camera menu interface is straightforward and easy to use and it didn't take me long to find the "underwater photo" setting.  I took a few snaps around a pool and everything seemed fine.  However, as soon as I started to use the camera actually underwater, the LCD screen appeared to fog up, as if water had got into it and it became totally unusable.  I persevered and took several more photos despite being unable to aim properly.  The camera claims to be waterproof down to 3m, so about 10 feet - I don't think I even went deeper than 5 or 6 feet, so it certainly wasn't anything to do with the water pressureOnce I got back to my hotel room, I opened up the watertight battery compartment and was pleased to see that both the batteries and the SD card seemed dry and unaffected - it was just the LCD screen that was now showing just a white screen with glimpses of the actual image.  Over several days the LCD screen seemed to "dry out" and return to almost normal view, but now some fo the menu buttons don't work.  Also the actual pictures taken by the camera underwater and video were OK, but nothing special - can't quite work out if that is the camera quality or the water visibility which was a bit cloudy, or a bit of both.Overall experience very poor and I returned the camera to Amazon - return was picked up quickly by UPS and full refund issued within three days - if only the camera had performed as well as Amazon

Reviews.Title: Easy to use and great pictures.
Reviews.Author: Dave Newman "Dave Newman"
Reviews.Content: We gave this to my Mother in Law for Christmas. Out of the box this camera is easy to use with big buttons and obvious controls. She loves it and actually uses it where she said she never would use a digital camera.Minor complaint on the location of the PC connection is that it's behind a hard to open door with the batteries and SD card. I giet it that the camera is "waterproof", but Nikon could have done better on this. Older hands will not have an easy time getting the door open or the cable plugged in. Offsetting is that the camera uses AA batteries so no recharging worries.Finally note that there is no SD card included. If it had an SD card I would rate it a 5 star.

Reviews.Title: Used it a few times, then it leaked, corroded and died.
Reviews.Author: MSB 90266 "msb"
Reviews.Content: This was only used a few times over the past year, when we went somewhere with water. The door cracked, everything corroded and fell apart. It worked fine while it lasted.

Reviews.Title: Daddy broke it
Reviews.Author: CecilSaxon
Reviews.Content: Not sure how I managed to break this camera but I dropped it about 3 feet and the sacrificial lens cracked. Not worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Used 5 times then it broke
Reviews.Author: Tori1968
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 12 year old daughter who loved it (NOT through Amazon).  After using for 5 non-consecutive days, the viewfinder went black.  I am able to see menu functions, but the camera will not take a photo.  I did some research, and apparently this is a common problem with this camera.  I am very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Not waterproof
Reviews.Author: Laurent De Brunhoff
Reviews.Content: A great idea poorly executed!Love the design features which should make this camera perfect for children, sadly it's not waterproof as claimed.Originally I was looking for a camera that could be dropped or used on a rainy day, but as the manufacturers' claimed it was good to use up to 3m under water, we took it into the pool for some fun. Just like the other reviewers have already said, we took 4-5 photos before the camera filled up with water and the display shorted out! Amazon tried to pull the "call Nikon, it's not our problem" card, but I explained the Sale of Goods Act and now they are refunding it, I think I'll take a risk and buy the S31 (surely Nikon must have fixed the problem with the new model??) once I get my refund. All a bit disappointing.

Reviews.Title: Dissatisfied
Reviews.Author: Born2Run52
Reviews.Content: How does one get the battery compartment to open? I've done everything I could figure to do and tried to find an answer online, but all I found were folks with similar complaints, about how it was difficult to open. But NOBODY said how they did it! I am so, so, so, so frustrated with Nikon right now, I could spit.

Reviews.Title: Eats batteries and flash issues....
Reviews.Author: Avid Reader in Clackamas
Reviews.Content: Eats batteries and flash issues....  Flashes in daylight, but no flash in darker rooms...  Go figure, I tried to have it force flash, but no option to do so.

Reviews.Title: Not very waterproof
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my 7-year old son, who loved it (when it worked).  We took it snorkeling, after a single use (less than 3 feet of water), the camera's screen wouldn't work.  We took it for one more snorkeling trip two days later, again in shallow water, we tried to use it without the video screen working; we were able to get some shots, but the camera never worked again.  You could see water had gotten inside the video screen, and there was condensation inside the battery casing.  We were fortunately able to get the photos off of the SD card, but the camera itself turned out to be a bit of a dud.  Too bad, because the functionality was nice for my 7-year old (again, when it worked!)

Reviews.Title: Flash doesn't work
Reviews.Author: Cdp
Reviews.Content: There seems to be a problem with the flash on this camera. I've sent it back for repair but it hasn't solved anything. The auto flash is completely random. Most of the time, even in extremely low light, it will not fire so images are often blurred. Not recommended.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy this product
Reviews.Author: Peter Maurer
Reviews.Content: This camera was leaking water when I used it the first time. I recommend to buy a more reliable product.

Reviews.Title: Fuzzy Images
Reviews.Author: bahamalight
Reviews.Content: I read a review of the product that basically expressed the same issues I have. The images a re blurry as if they photographs were taken of an object in motion. Adjusting the settings and lighting did not enhance the quality of the images. The company was contacted multiple times but a reply was NEVER recieved.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: WannaRip "WannaRip"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  It takes nice crips pictures with great color.  Easy to use and fits in purse or pocket perfectly.  Not bulky, just right.

Reviews.Title: broke now our of warranty
Reviews.Author: brian
Reviews.Content: it broke. i can view pictures but cant take any.  just black screen in either camera mode like im in the dark.  the screen still works as all the settings menu's are accessible still as well. now amazon says it's out of warranty

Reviews.Title: Very Unimpressed
Reviews.Author: Emily Sutler
Reviews.Content: At first I really thought it was great.  Very easy to operate.  The reason I'm giving it this rating is bc I'm very unimpressed with the product & I'm actually looking for a new camera.  The quality of the pic. did not meet my expectations because you cannot keep the flash on all the time, which is ridiculous.  The flash allows the best pic. possible but with this product there is not a way to keep it on all the time and sometimes even after you attempt to turn it on it still doe not work.  I think it would be good for a little kid learning to use a camera & not expecting to have great photos but in my opinion it's a really bad camera and I'm disappointed that I purchased it.  It was a waste of my $75 plus shipping.

Reviews.Title: Not good for Pictures
Reviews.Author: M. Montgomery "Inflightt"
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these camera's for my 5 and 8 year olds, they asked for a camera that takes underwater photo's. We haven't tried the underwater portion of the camera; however, for normal picture taking this is not a good camera, the clearity of the pictures are very subpar. Technology in cameras to date should be able to produce good pictures regaurdless of the ability to take photo's underwater. I would not recommend buying this camera.

Reviews.Title: Should have read the fine print.
Reviews.Author: Iris M. Horton "Iris"
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these cameras for my granddaughters for Christmas. I didn't realize they were not rechargeable and require 2 AA batteries.

Reviews.Title: Nearly perfect for my 3 year old
Reviews.Author: Kevinbergin
Reviews.Content: After looking at overpriced 1 megapixel toddler cameras, I decided to spend just a little more and buy my 3 year old a camera that had some room for her to grow into it. It has been nearly perfect for her; it can handle the bumps and bruises are inevitable with a toddler owner, and the size is good for her small hands. Occasionally she has trouble with the shutter button being a bit heavy, but considering that she isn't exactly the ideal user I can't fault the camera for that. I can't attest to the waterproofing because we haven't had that accident yet, but the fact that the lens doesn't extend makes for one less chance for things to go wrong. If you're considering spending $50-60 on a toy toddler camera, this one at around $80 is a fantastic value; I feel like this is the type of camera we would buy her next, but she's able to use it now just as well as a little tikes one. In my eyes, that's $60 saved.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for kids
Reviews.Author: jacques
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera for our 5 year old son and he loves it. He has been able to shoot pretty good pictures and films because it's very simple and intuitive to use, and it's robust enough to go anywhere including underwater without any fear for scratch. After 2 months of use we're very happy with our choice.

Reviews.Title: Great Value!
Reviews.Author: Jose Arroyo
Reviews.Content: Fast delivery, this Nikon does what it's called for. Recommended! it's great for the price. You can actually record video under water (in pools better).

Reviews.Title: DO NOT buy this camera!
Reviews.Author: Ballhead
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my 8 year old daughter, and it accumulated moisture on the first use in a pool. No hatches opened, not dropped. All pictures unusable due to the fogged lens, nad the camera subsequently crashed.I got the camera replaced, and it worked well again above water. Now, on vacation, guess what. It fails sgain on first use in water. Again, not dropped, no hatches have been opened and the camera is full of moisture. Second vacation without a waterproof camera.This is a toy for above water use. If you need a waterproof camera, buy a secent one.

Reviews.Title: Poor Design
Reviews.Author: Sabrina
Reviews.Content: Lots of review of this in the water, I got this for taking pictures in the rain and other bad weather so I have never had any water issues.1. Battery area is poor design, 2 little plastic tabs are suppose to keep the batteries in place while uploading photos, yea these wore off in a week now I have to hold the batteries in place while uploading photos, very poor design.2. Flash, why can I choose to have auto flash or no flash but not an option for always flash...CrapDo not buy

Reviews.Title: Good camera, but not waterproof..
Reviews.Author: KS
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to do some beach pics, and the pics were nice, but after 1 hour of using in shallow warm ocean water, the water went through, and the display gone wet inside, full with water drops..So, brand new camera, great pictures and fun, and the fun was gone..Thanks, China people. I returned it, but i would like to keep it..

Reviews.Title: Don't buy.
Reviews.Author: a "a"
Reviews.Content: Camera is crappy at best. It would probably make a nice gift for a first time camera user/child. But if you're expecting to buy this and take good photos, keep looking.

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Yoscarol Sanabria
Reviews.Content: la camara es muy buena excelente vendedor lo recomiendo ampliamente, me en canta la calidad de las imagenes, definitivamente excelente producto

Reviews.Title: Purchased this for my 5-year old daughter.
Reviews.Author: Dandroid
Reviews.Content: My 5-year old daughter dropped it while taking a picture.  My daughter is about 3 feet tall.  So she probably dropped it 2 and a half feet and the sensor is somehow dislodged.  The screen lets you replay pictures and shows some black fuzziness when trying to take a new picture, but is no longer functional.

ProductInfo.Features:
10.1 Megapixel CCD sensor
3x Zoom-NIKKOR glass lens
2.7-inch Bright LCD Monitor
HD (720p) Movies
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon COOLPIX S30 10.1 MP Digital Camera with 3x Zoom Nikkor Glass Lens and 2.7-inch LCD (Pink)
